mapper.select: select MID, MPW, MNAME, MIMG, MDP, MPHONE, MMAIL from tbl_member where MID = #{MID} and MPW = #{MPW}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set sessionkey =#{sessionId}, sessionlimit =#{next} where MID =#{MID}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where sessionkey = #{value} and sessionlimit > now()
